name: the-civil-wars-headline-the-ryman-january-12-tickets-on-sale-october-21
title: The Civil Wars Headline The Ryman January 12, Tickets On Sale October 21
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
The Civil Wars have announced their first headlining performance at The Ryman, set for January 12. We’ve watched them go from playing for a handful of people at the French Quarter Cafe to playing for thousands on the Adele tour and selling out theaters on their own, and we’re pretty dang proud that Nashvillians can claim we-heard-them-first bragging rights. Tickets go on sale Friday, October 21 and you can bet we’ll be first in line.

Photo from The Civil Wars Tour Diary.
